definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: The Archive lets the public upload or download digital material for free.
sentences.chinese: 這個檔案館允許公衆免費上傳和下載數字材料。

sentences.english: Historical materials of reclaim and cultivate in Kaiyuan and Mengzi district, Yunnan Province are mainly preserved in Yunnan Archives.
sentences.chinese: 雲南開蒙墾殖的史料主要保存在雲南省檔案館。

sentences.english: Blanton says the archive’s collection of photos also tells a story.
sentences.chinese: 布蘭頓說，檔案館收集的照片也有自己的故事。

sentences.english: Whoever donates archives to the State shall be rewarded by the archives repositories concerned.
sentences.chinese: 向國家捐贈檔案的，檔案館應當予以獎勵。

sentences.english: Therefore, the archives should adjust to the change of society and make efficient reformations on its own accord.
sentences.chinese: 檔案館應主動適應社會的變遷，進行有效的改革。

sentences.english: This article studies the basic architecture of commercial aircraft digital archives and the construction methods.
sentences.chinese: 對民機數字檔案館的基本架構及構建方式進行了探討。

sentences.english: In 2007, his 84 photos were collected by Timothy PRUS, London, England.
sentences.chinese: 2007年84張照片被英國當代衝突檔案館收藏。

sentences.english: She rarely had to access the Jedi archives; her knowledge of galactic politics was immense.
sentences.chinese: 她通曉銀河系的政治狀況，幾乎不用去查絕地檔案館。

sentences.english: The FTU exists for those who wish to use and support the Archiv .
sentences.chinese: FTU因這些希望使用和支持檔案館的人而存在。

sentences.english: The Archives has banned Lowry from its facilities.
sentences.chinese: 目前檔案館已禁止了勞萊使用該館的設施。

sentences.english: And the Archives are about to launch a unique experiment with these photographs.
sentences.chinese: 如今國家檔案館對這些照片發起了一次獨特的試驗。

sentences.english: Alexa continues to supply the Internet Archive with web crawls.
sentences.chinese: Alexa的繼續提供互聯網檔案館的網頁檢索。

sentences.english: Archives of the past winners and questioners.
sentences.chinese: 檔案館過去的獲獎者和發問。

sentences.english: She went to the city archive this morning.
sentences.chinese: 她今天上午去了市檔案館。

sentences.english: They call this project the Shakespeare electronic archive.
sentences.chinese: 他們稱這個項目爲莎士比亞電子檔案館。

sentences.english: The emperor's decrees and letters were in the national archives.
sentences.chinese: 的御令和信件保存在國家檔案館裏。

definition: PRC State Administration of Cultural Heritage (SACH)
UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: expeditionary force/army on a distant expedition
Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Qing Dynasty
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
